links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 579
maple: spec := [S,{S=Prod(Z,Z,Sequence(Z),Union(Z,Sequence(Z)))},labeled]: seq(combstruct[count](spec,size=n), n=0..20);restart:printlevel := -1; a := [0]; T := x->LambertW(-x); f := series(((1+T(x)))/(1-T(x)), x, 24); for m from 1 to 19 do a := [op(a), op(2*m, f)*m! ] od; print(a);# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 28 2009]
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
